DOC.brief_summary: Atopic dermatitis recurrent pruritic skin disorder significant morbidity impair quality life due specially pruritus physical visible skin lesion . The propose trial evaluate effectiveness clemastine fumarate 1 , 0 mg/g + dexamethasone 0 , 5 mg/g compare dexchlorpheniramine maleate 10 mg/g eczema treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Clemastine Fumarate + Dexamethasone Compared Dexchlorpheniramine Maleate Eczema Treatment
